snippet: Malawi suspended its laws against same-sex relationships on Monday and ordered the police not to arrest gays pending a decision on whether to repeal the legislation.
abstract: Malawi suspends its laws against same-sex relationships and orders police not to arrest gay people pending decision on whether to repeal legislation.
lead_paragraph: Malawi suspended its laws against same-sex relationships on Monday and ordered the police not to arrest gays pending a decision on whether to repeal the legislation.

headline.seo: Malawi: Laws Suspended Against Same-Sex Couples
headline.main: Malawi: Government Suspends Laws Against Same-Sex Couples
headline.print_headline: Malawi: Government Suspends Laws Against Same-Sex Couples
